TopicTitle: Trying to perform science without science modules

Articles.Content:
I painstakingly brought this 2 ton probe to Minmus to have it perform all manner of science with the goo canisters. Upon arrival I realized I was missing a few semi-important pieces. I made a short list of steps for dealing with spontaneously unsatisfactory science, as I'm calling it.

1) Excitement

2) Confusion

3) Blank Stare

4) Denial

5) Anger

6) More Denial

7) Sadness

8) Facepalm

9) Acceptance

(Add more denial as needed.)

At least the view is nice...

Edited October 18, 2013 by PTNLemay
